collection:
## Privacy Policy

Information Collection and Use

AI Search Agents JP ("the Company") may collect and use personal information
for the purposes of providing and improving our services.

This information may
include but is not limited to your name, email address, and any other
information you provide to us.

We may also collect non-personal information,
such as browser type, IP address, and access times, to analyze trends and
improve our services.

Cookies

We may use cookies to collect and store information about your preferences and
browsing habits.
sharing:
The Company does not share your personal information
with third parties unless required by law.
